content.p: This category contains the University's academic regulations, frameworks and guidance for teaching and learning activities. These pages are applicable to staff and students across all of the UK, China and Malaysia campuses. Undergraduate study regulations Postgraduate Taught study regulations Contingency regulations China and Malaysia-specific regulations Qualification types and structures Teaching and learning Student Services Academic-Service-Office@nottingham.edu.cn student_registry@nottingham.edu.my Quality-Manual-Enquiries@nottingham.ac.uk Portland Building, University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
